backend/main.mo: Motoko canister exposing a greeting card object and a static avatar blob via public methods.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files.
frontend/code.gs: Google Apps Script bot handling Jira incident workflows, configuration loading, and Chat message routing.
frontend/index.css: Tailwindâ€‘based global CSS with OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React frontend entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React UI showing bot avatar, setup instructions, and utilities using data from the backend canister.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching greeting card and static avatar from the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Duplicate Tailwind base stylesheet defining design tokens and theme variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entrypoint rendering React with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a Google Chat bot integrated with Jira, including architecture notes, known issues, and a list of feature definitions.
